text: The women's 4 × 150 metres relay event at the 1967 European Indoor Games was held on 11 and 12 March in Prague. Each athlete ran one lap of the 150 metres track. ==Results== ===Heats=== First 2 teams in each heat (Q) qualified directly for the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center" |- !Rank !! Heat !! Nation !! Competitors !! Time !! title: 1967 European Indoor Games – Women's 4 × 150 metres relay
